title: FileUpload component
description: Schema that describes the layout configuration for a FileUpload component.

textResourceBindings.title: Text resource bindings
textResourceBindings.description: Text resource bindings for a component.

maxFileSizeInMB.title: Maximum file size in MB
maxFileSizeInMB.description: Sets the maximum file size allowed in megabytes.

maxNumberOfAttachments.title: Maximum allowed attachments
maxNumberOfAttachments.description: Sets the maximum number of attachments allowed to upload.

minNumberOfAttachments.title: Minimum allowed attachments
minNumberOfAttachments.description: Sets the minimum number of attachments to upload

displayMode.title: Display mode
displayMode.description: Sets the display mode for the file upload component.

hasCustomFileEndings.title: Has custom file endings
hasCustomFileEndings.description: Boolean value indicating if the component has valid file endings

validFileEndings.title: Valid file endings
validFileEndings.description: A comma separated string of valid file endings to upload. If not set all endings are accepted.

renderAsSummary.title: Render as summary
renderAsSummary.description: Boolean or expression indicating if the component should be rendered as a summary. Defaults to false.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be hidden. Defaults to false.

grid.title: Grid
grid.description: Settings for the components grid. Used for controlling horizontal alignment.
